body_html:
Hi @angersson

I think this was closed prematurely, TF 1.12 explicitly mentions building with XLA.

Yet the docker version is not - I fully believe this to be an error.

It might well be in alpha/beta but now that TF is built with XLA enabled the docker versions should support that.

I’ve managed to fix it by manually installing the TF version in RC yet it still seems a hack fix when you provide the container.

Thanks,
Joe

body:
Hi @angersson

I think this was closed prematurely, TF 1.12 explicitly mentions building with XLA.

Yet the docker version is not - I fully believe this to be an error.

It might well be in alpha/beta but now that TF is built with XLA enabled the docker versions should support that.

I’ve managed to fix it by manually installing the TF version in RC yet it still seems a hack fix when you provide the container.

Thanks,
Joe
